testcase.name: Successful Login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Sauce Demo Login Page.....................................passed When I fill the account information for account StandardUser into the "standard_user" field and the "secret_sauce" field.passed And I click the Login Button................................................passed Then I am redirected to the Sauce Demo Main Page............................passed And I verify the App Logo exists............................................passed

testcase.name: Failed Login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Sauce Demo Login Page.....................................passed When I fill the account information for account StandardUser into the "locked_out_user" field and the "secret_sauce" field.passed And I click the Login Button................................................passed Then I verify the Error Message contains the text "Sorry, this user has been banned.".passed
